name: Future-friendly
body: ### Welcome to Creating a Responsive Future-friendly Web This is the workshop I made for WMS London, UK 2013 ``` $ cd your_repo_root/Future-friendly $ git fetch origin $ git checkout gh-pages ``` If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch. ### Topics -Building a Responsive Future-Friendly Web -What is "the Web"? -Think again. What is the "The Web"? -Developing across multiple platforms and browsers -What is a future-friendly Web -Questions?. -The End. ### DEMO:.html www.leolanese.com/workshop/ ### License, Authors and Contributors Pictures: Borrowed from http://www.pixeden.com/ ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Pages? or any comment you think I need to include? email me at developer@leolanese.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
